wikitext.*:
'''Eärendur''' (pron. {{IPA|[ˌe.aˈrendur]}}) is [[Quenya]] for "Mariner" (lit. "sea-servant"), and can refer to:
* [[Eärendur (son of Tar-Amandil)|Eärendur]] (born {{SA|361}}), the second son of the third [[Kings of Númenor|King]] of [[Númenor]], [[Tar-Amandil]].
* [[Eärendur (Lord of Andúnië)|Eärendur]] (late [[Second Age]]), the fifteenth [[Lords of Andúnië|Lord of Andúnië]].
* [[Eärendur (King of Arnor)|Eärendur]] ({{TA|640}} - {{TA|861|n}}), the tenth, and last, [[Kings of Arnor|King]] of [[Arnor]].
==See also==
*[[Eärnur]], which is a contraction of Eärendur.
